about_the_game:
Ankhway it's a 2D Indie Adventure and Sci-fi videogame with an epic, original and intriguing story that incorporates systems like jumping to avoid traps such as spikes, shooting, ''MP3 Player'' Item to listen to the soundtrack completely free in-game... Among many other mechanics and game systems! Combining the adventure (Exploration, puzzle-solving etc) with action and science fiction.



NEO-RETRO MODERN PIXEL ART STYLE GRAPHICS

Features gorgeous, colorful hand-drawn pixel art by awesome artists like Rinober, KR or NeonPixel






In a remote and wild area of the Sahara Desert
an adventurer expert in Hieroglyphs and history
of Egypt has just discovered something that would
change many more things you could never think about.


After days of working to dig everything up, he discovers
what turns out to be some underground ruins, a small
pyramid and a sphinx in perfect condition, thus revealing its
face. In addition, a strange opening but in the ground, so the pyramid
seems inaccessible and it seems like it acts as an antenna,
is located at the top of what appears to be
the entrance to some secret passages.


The Egyptian government seems astonished but nervous and
scared, they somehow know that the adventurous explorer
is going to get into the underground ruins to explore
this unknown place.



After arduous discussions, he managed to get them to leave him,
however, they feel responsible for what may happen to him and
they will wait at the exit.



This can certainly be the beginning of his great adventure\..\..\..









  • Real Time Action




  • Melee Weapons




  • Shooting System




  • Sprint and Stamina




  • Vehicles




  • Jump System




  • Minigames




  • Exploration




  • Diagonal Movement/Jump and Smooth and Precise Pixel-Based Movement




  • Puzzle Solving



EPIC SOUNDTRACK

Made by talented composers like Joel Steulder, Aaron Lucas or Elektrobear. Listen to the soundtrack in-game with the item ''MP3 Player''!







~ The videogame contains non-realistic violence (Pixel art) such as blood, shooting and moderately vulgar language; occasional swear words.



☥𓂀𓂀𓂀𓋹𓁈𓃠𓆃☥𓅓𓆣

IT'S THE TIME

IT'S YOUR DESTINY

ENTER THE ANKHWAY!

☥𓂀𓂀𓂀𓋹𓁈𓃠𓆃☥𓅓𓆣

name: Ankhway: The Interplanetary Legacy Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Microsoft® Windows® 7/8/8.1/10 (32bit/64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Microsoft® Windows® 7/8/8.1/10 (32bit/64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-4340 or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL ES 2.0 hardware driver support required for WebGL acceleration. (AMD Catalyst 10.9, nVidia 358.50)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Indie Adventure Sci-fi Videogame ☥𓂀𓂀𓂀𓋹𓁈𓃠𓆃☥𓅓𓆣 IT'S THE TIME, IT'S YOUR DESTINY, ¡ENTER THE ANKHWAY! ☥𓂀𓂀𓂀𓋹𓁈𓃠𓆃☥𓅓𓆣
supported_languages: English, Spanish - Spain, Spanish - Latin America
